languages.text: "О, будь уверен, я смотрю за каждым твоим шагом, нечисть. И когда ты предашь Вольного Торговца — а ты предашь — я буду рядом".
"Rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."
languages.original_text: "О, будь уверен, я смотрю за каждым твоим шагом, нечисть. И когда ты предашь Вольного Торговца — а ты предашь — я буду рядом".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."
"Oh, rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."
"Oh, rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."
"Oh, rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."

languages.text: “别担心，我每时每刻都在紧盯着你的一举一动，怪物。如果你胆敢背叛行商浪人，那你就会——我就会采取行动。”
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."

traits.locale_text: “噢，我无时无刻不在盯着你的一举一动，怪物。如果你胆敢背叛行商浪人，那你就会——我就会采取行动。”

languages.text: « Sachez que je surveille le moindre de vos mouvements, abomination. Quand vous trahirez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, ce qui n'est qu'une question de temps, je serai prête. »
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, sachez que je surveille le moindre de vos mouvements, abomination. Quand vous trahirez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, ce qui n'est qu'une question de temps, je serai prête. »

languages.text: "Seid versichert, dass ich Euch genauestens beobachte, Abscheulichkeit. Wenn Ihr {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} verratet — und das werdet Ihr -, dann bin ich bereit."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, seid versichert, dass ich Euch genauestens beobachte, Abscheulichkeit. Wenn Ihr {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} verratet — und das werdet Ihr -, dann bin ich bereit."

languages.text: 「安心して忌まわしき者。私はあなたの一挙手一投足を見張っているわ。自由開拓者を裏切れば…あなたも…私も準備はできてる」
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、安心して忌まわしき者。私はあなたの一挙手一投足を見張っているわ。自由開拓者を裏切ればーーあなたもーー私も準備はできてる」

languages.text: «Te vigilo constantemente. Vigilo cada paso que das, abominación. Cuando traiciones a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, y es inevitable que lo hagas, estaré lista».
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."

traits.locale_text: «Ya lo creo que te miro. Vigilo cada paso que das, abominación. Cuando traiciones a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, y es inevitable que lo hagas, estaré lista».

languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."

languages.text: "Hiç endişen olmasın, her adımını izliyorum ucube. Hür Tacir'e ihanet ettiğinde, ki biliyorum edeceksin, hazır olacağım."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I am watching your every move, abomination. When you betray the Rogue Trader — and you will — I will be ready."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç endişen olmasın, her adımını izliyorum ucube. Hür Tacir'e ihanet ettiğinde, ki biliyorum edeceksin, hazır olacağım."
